name: Include laroux.js
description: Includes laroux.js to your page in order to use its features

name: Confirmation Buttons
description: Requests confirmation before link and button actions, if the element has .confirm-action class

name: Auto Select Texts
description: Automatically selects all contents of text fields on the page when they get focus

name: Auto Clear Texts
description: Automatically clears all contents of text fields on the page when they get focus

name: Smooth Page Scroll
description: Scrolls smoothly to anchors in page, if the clicked link has .scroll-link class
